spec_data.Name: glib
spec_data.Description:
GLib is a handy library of utility functions. This C library is
designed to solve some portability problems and provide other useful
functionality that most programs require.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Thu 03 Aug 2017 04:16:28 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: A library of handy utility functions
